resources.string: You need to grant location permission in order to use this app.
Please turn on device location in Settings and try again.
Cannot Add Bump at the moment Check your device location

In this app: 
You can save bumps location. 
You can share that data with other users. 
You can connect to your car's embedded system using bluetooth to make use of this data in adaptive cruise control system In this app: 
You can save bumps location. 
You can share that data with other users. 
You can connect to your car's embedded system using bluetooth to make use of this data in adaptive cruise control system
The app saves bumps locations and send you notification when you are close to a bump
All Bumps locations are stored in cloud database.\nAll users are sharing data together

This app is developed as a part of graduation project: Advanced Driver Assistant System (ADAS)

Supervisor: Dr.Mostafa Salah
Developer: Tasneem Ibraheem
